description: By using this schema, Solargis has prepared a catalogue of definitions for each Solargis column name from solargis_common_enums.schema.json#/$defs/SolargisColumnNamesEnum.

$schema.description: Catalogue document instance must comply with the schema referenced by this keyword.

SolargisApplication.description: Solargis application or system, e.g., legacy or Prospect. Each app can have multiple definitions of a name, but usually just single one.

SolargisColumnNameProperties.description: Other properties of Solargis column names taken from #/$defs/SolargisColumnNamesEnum (each column type has a predefined description and set of allowed units).

columnType.description: Column type for this column name.

timeStep.description: Allowed time steps for this column name.

description.description: Default descriptive text Solargis uses for a column name.

units.description: Allowed units for a column name. Base units, not multiples.

categories.description: Some columns have pre-defined values - categories.

ValueRange.description: Range of possible numeric values for a column name.
